name: Blue Door
description:
Play in FULLSCREEN

The resolution is optimized only for 1920x1080

Controls

Horizontal Movement - A,D or Left Arrow, Right Arrow 

Jumping - Space (hold)

Climbing - Shift (grab on to wall)

Description

Platformer inspired by games such as Jump King with climbing, characters and dialogues.

Main difference from other games is that your failure is 50% of the time the game's fault, meaning - there are bugs.
